project.name: Email Client-React Project
project.description: I completed this project as part of a team using React and TailWind to build an email client based on a supplied design and an existing API. The application included features such as pagination, search, and filters, and had a responsive front-end.
project.moreinfo: I worked on the 'open email' and 'search bar' features of the email client. I am particularly proud of the search bar functionality, which filters/unfilters the emails as the user types.

project.name: Project Manager-PHP Project
project.description: I built this project manager as part of a team using PHP. We were provided with the front-end for this project and were supplied with an API. I built the back-end for this project manager using Object Oriented Programming in PHP and MySQL. I wrote and employed unit tests to ensure our code worked correctly.
project.moreinfo: I worked on: fetching and displaying all active projects; fetching and displaying a specific task; displaying a specific task in red if it was overdue or grey if it wasn't overdue; writing the unit tests for all stories. I really enjoyed the problem-solving aspect of writing the unit tests in this project.

project.name: Hotel Booking API-Laravel Project
project.description: I built this project as part of a team. We built an API for a hotel booking website using Object Orientated Programming with Laravel using Postman and MySQL that works with a pre-built React front-end application. I wrote and employed HTTP tests.
project.moreinfo: I worked on: returning the information for a single hotel room; returning information on all current and future bookings; generating a report that returned the total number of bookings for each room ever and the average booking duration for each room. I then wrote passing HTTP tests for each of these stories.
